action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image is a simple, pixelated illustration in an abstract style. It features four individual shapes, each composed of smaller, square pixels. Starting from the left, the first element is a cross, with each arm colored in purple. To the right of the cross, there is a green square shape that resembles a letter 'F' due to a missing square in the bottom right corner. Adjacent to the 'F' is another purple shape, identical to the first cross in its design. The last shape on the right is a pink square with the lower half having a staircase-like structure subtracted from it, resulting in three squares being cut out from the bottom right side. The shapes are evenly spaced with a white background filling the rest of the space.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several letters designed in a pixel-art style. The letters are colored green, purple, and pink. There's a 'H' in green, followed by a plus sign in purple, then an 'F' in green, and followed by a 'P' in pink. A small part of an orange letter is visible at the bottom right corner. There is no discernible background or additional elements within the image.

I will provide my description after your turn.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image is a simple, pixelated illustration in an abstract style. It features four individual shapes, each composed of smaller, square pixels. Starting from the left, the first element is a cross, with each arm colored in purple. To the right of the cross, there is a green square shape that resembles a letter 'F' due to a missing square in the bottom right corner. Adjacent to the 'F' is another purple shape, identical to the first cross in its design. The last shape on the right is a pink square with the lower half having a staircase-like structure subtracted from it, resulting in three squares being cut out from the bottom right side. The shapes are evenly spaced with a white background filling the rest of the space.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of a collection of distinct pixel art shapes. From the left, there is a purple cross, following which a green square with a 'U' shape created by a black line is present. The third shape is another purple cross, identical to the first. Lastly, there is a pink square with a descending staircase-like line subtracted from its bottom side. The shapes are set against a white backdrop.

Based on your description, what is the significance of the missing square in the bottom right corner of the green shape that resembles a 'F'?
